greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n minus (largest prime power in n factorization); a(1) = 0.
comment: a(n) = 0 when n is a prime power (A000961). - _Michel Marcus_, Dec 03 2013
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A081805(n) = if(1==n,0,my(f = factor(n)); n - vecmax(vector(#f~, k, f[k, 1]^f[k, 2]))); \\ _Michel Marcus_ Jul 24 2017 & _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 06 2018
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 10 2003
ext: Term a(1) = 0 prepended by _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 06 2018
